comment.author: 34302166@N04
comment._content: This is not a part of Hardangerfjord. The road between Voss and Stalheim continues down the Naeroydalen valley and ends in Gudvangen. This is where Naeroyfjord starts (UNESCO World Heritage). Naeroyfjord is a branch of the longest fjord in Norway, Sognefjord (204 km long). Check out www.naeroyfjord.com

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/34302166@N04]  Thanks!  We've updated the description. -- Helena (LOC)
